snippet: Jon Shenk’s documentary “The Island President” aims to raise awareness about climate change and issues of democracy.
abstract: Jon Shenk’s documentary film The Island President about former Maldives president Mohamed Nasheed aims to raise awareness about climate change by giving it a human face; Nasheed has passionately argued that rising sea levels could wipe out his country unless the world takes action; film also took on new focus of democracy when Nasheed stepped down as president after the police and army turned against him.
lead_paragraph: Jon Shenk’s documentary “The Island President” aims to raise awareness about climate change and issues of democracy.

headline.seo: ‘The Island President’ and Mohamed Nasheed of the Maldives
